entities.name: the riddle house
entities.description: The Riddle House is mentioned as a specific location where Frank works and lives. It is described as an old house with gardens that the boys from the village like to throw stones at.

entities.name: frank
entities.description: Frank is the gardener of The Riddle House. He is described as being very deaf and having a bad leg, but still working in the garden despite his age.

entities.name: the village
entities.description: The village is mentioned as the place where the boys who torment Frank live.

relationships.description: Frank works in The Riddle House, taking care of its gardens.
The boys from the village like to throw stones at Frank and break into his house for a dare.
